body:
notebook list:

![screen shot 2013-06-02 at 13 05 44](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/151929/596842/1e4756ec-cbc0-11e2-9b4b-d90775da5bc0.png)

notebook menu:

![screen shot 2013-06-02 at 13 06 58](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/151929/596841/1bfe68c6-cbc0-11e2-935c-92471bb137b9.png)

> notebook menu: [capture]

Move Up, Move Up ?

Some other commet as I test.
- [x] BreadCrumb all caps in dashboard, annoying IMHO.
- [x] classical IPython Logo seem not centered
- [x] 404s : WARNING:tornado.access:404 GET /static/base/js/dialog.js (127.0.0.1) 0.96ms
  - imply kernel restart broken ...
  - and cannot rename
- [x] my js extensions are broken... :-( 
- [x] a few pixels of codemirror cuts at the bottom of each cell (basically just end of edittor just after the baseline)
- [x] Pager a few pixels too low, and don't take all the width of the screen... feel weird.
- [x] celltype selector blank when "code" cell selected.

Looks nice, somme comment added on previous post not to spam the people watching the thread.
I would also personally change the font of the save widget.
I'll test that.
I will try to look at this this week...still travelling...
Only annoying point is missing `base/js/dialog.js`. Will go to sleep now, and hope it wil have appeared  tomorrow morning when I update IPython in my lab to do data analysis :-)

> I would also personally change the font of the save widget.

yup - there are still quite a few things styled by jquery-ui that shouldn't be. I haven't gotten to the save or notification widgets yet

> classical IPython Logo seem not centered

what does this mean?

> my js extensions are broken... :-(

broken is unhelpful, what changed?

> a few pixels of codemirror cuts at the bottom of each cell (basically just end of edittor just after the baseline)

what does this mean? I haven't changed any vertical styling inside the cells

> celltype selector blank when "code" cell selected.

I've noticed this - it's weird because I don't think I have touched any of the relevant code.
Should be a couple of weirdnesses addressed

Haven't repull (don't want to restart sever yet) so here are more descriptive answers:

> classical IPython Logo seem not centered

![capture decran 2013-06-03 a 08 47 00](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/335567/597958/b01226ac-cc19-11e2-8230-4d6d3888e03d.png)
But that'as actully the all page that is scrolled a few pixels. 

> my js extensions are broken... :-(

No worry, they just don't find the jQuery icon so buttons are only 4px by 4px

> what does this mean? I haven't changed any vertical styling inside the cells
> ![capture decran 2013-06-03 a 08 47 21](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/335567/597961/cb67ff30-cc19-11e2-90b6-e2fc52a9093a.png)

Due to codemirror-scroll -38 pixel, I may have missed it before because of stale cache, so not this PR.

> > celltype selector blank when "code" cell selected.
> > I've noticed this - it's weird because I don't think I have touched any of the relevant code.

I can see the word  "Code" while loading, could it be that when cell change to code it fires an event that have a typo and set the drop down menu to an non-exiting value ?
Yep, codecell.js is missing a `this.cell_type = 'code'`, I guess without bootstrap select ' undefined ' is the first value, wherease with bootstrap it defaults to empty.

<del>Cannot scroll with the mouse if the pointer is outside of the container, in on left or right.</del>

[Edit] : fixed

![capture decran 2013-06-03 a 14 25 34](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/335567/599197/5cf69938-cc48-11e2-8f13-1fbf652fd82c.png)

In Prompt eaten if window not wide enough.

[Edit] Fixed

> Cannot scroll with the mouse if the pointer is outside of the container, in on left or right.

And there is a beautiful toolbar at the edge of the container when using FF+Windows at least.

Toolbar icon not centered vertically in FF.
![capture decran 2013-06-03 a 17 05 50](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/335567/600080/d203604c-cc5e-11e2-841b-2339d483dc3c.png)
Don't know if you had really a lot of time to actually **use** it, but I did my data analysis with it today, and the UI felt more fluid. No scientific measurement of the feeling though.

there's still a lot to fiddle with before it's acceptable, but for the most part I find it cleaner.  I don't intend to redo the Cell layout in this PR, but I expect it will be really nice to layout individual cells with fluid containers.

> there's still a lot to fiddle with before it's acceptable, but for the most part I find it cleaner.

Hope you don't mind, I update the PR message at the beginning instead of just posting new messages.

> I don't intend to redo the Cell layout in this PR, but I expect it will be really nice to layout individual cells with fluid containers.

I hope nbconvert could be merge before that so that we keep the html in sync.

Hum, can't delete notebook anymore from dashboard, but don't know if it is this branch. 
Can't restart now so leaving a message here.

> Hum, can't delete notebook anymore from dashboard, but don't know if it is this branch. 
> Can't restart now so leaving a message here.

Was able to delete on master. 

Also, this need rebase.
Hum... I can't have any dropdown menu anymore... No js error though. No clue what's happening

Never mind. I checked the HEAD of the PR instead of merging and it works again.
We'll have to be carefull while merging then. but I don't understand what could have gone wrong. Submodule ?
almost there - raw input and cell toolbar mostly left to do
will re-test tomorrow and complain again :-)
great, thanks!

Hopefully I can get to the toolbar and raw_input done today as well, but
I'm not sure.

On Wed, Jun 12, 2013 at 1:40 PM, MinRK benjaminrk@gmail.com wrote:

> great, thanks!

I think making it usable (raw input and dialog) is the more important.
Details can be left to refining later.

Will be happy to complain if you like it. But for now I'll go to sleep to
have a lot of energy to find defect just before tomorrow hangout.

Le mercredi 12 juin 2013, Min RK a écrit :

> Hopefully I can get to the toolbar and raw_input done today as well, but
> I'm not sure.
> 
> On Wed, Jun 12, 2013 at 1:40 PM, MinRK <benjaminrk@gmail.com<javascript:_e({}, 'cvml', 'benjaminrk@gmail.com');>>
> wrote:
> 
> > great, thanks!
> 
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHubhttps://github.com/ipython/ipython/pull/3393#issuecomment-19342289
> .
cell toolbar and raw_input should be working now. Not brilliant styling yet, but it's not broken anymore.

At this point, I think nothing should be broken, and all dialogs should be bootstrap instead of jQuery, so if that's not true, let me know.  Still some styling and maybe menubar click event tweaking to do, but should be ready for another review pass.

Just because you like when I complain and when we don't agree, I have things to say. 

Red delete button in dashboard flash a lot, it does not directly delete do I think not having it red would be ok.

Keyboard shortcut modal could be higher or resizable. And on the fist line `Shift-something` have a newline after the dash.

Would like the ability to have the container wider, not a problem for now. But there is a change of comportment of images wider that the container that will be resized to fit it.

I unchecked `no more white space below the last cell at the bottom of the screen` I I still don't have any.

Leftover console.log in `default.js` `add_raw_edit`

> Keyboard shortcut modal could be higher or resizable. And on the fist line Shift-something have a newline after the dash.

I don't see any broken lines, screenshot?
Bootstrap dialogs aren't nearly as customizeable as jquery-ui. There's no particularly simple way to resize.
